com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service

Interface ClusterPropertyService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterPropertyServiceImpl

    public interface ClusterPropertyService
    The ClusterPropertyService is an interface which defines services to user to create, update service status and fetch Cluster Properties details.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    ClusterPropertyService
